topic.title: Projects
topic.p: Projects let you combine Qodana reports within an organization and a team.
For %product%, each project is uniquely identified by a project token. This token lets you upload %product% reports to a specific project.

chapter.title: Create a project
chapter.p: On a team page, click the Create project button.

In case you would like to review %product% reports apart from your private organization, you need to navigate to the team you wish to create a project under. On the team page, click the Create project button.

img.alt: Creating a new project in an organization

chapter.p: Now, you can see the project.

chapter.title: Manage a project
chapter.p: After the project was created, click Generate token to generate a unique project token for it. Using this token, you can upload reports to the project as described in the section.
Once the token is generated, you can regenerate it, rename the project, or delete the project.
